column3: [' (StepDescription: Cut-Cut 1/4 block or 3 ounces of fresh tofu into large cubes (about 1 in x 1 in))']
[' (StepDescription: pat-pat tofu dry with a towel)']
[' (StepDescription: Add-Add 1 tablespoon of olive oil to a non-stick pan)']
[' (StepDescription: add-add the tofu cubes to the pan)']
[' (StepDescription: add-add 1/4 tsp salt to the pan)']
[' (StepDescription: Turn-Turn on the heat to medium)']
[' (StepDescription: Cook-Cook 5 to 6 minutes until tofu cubes are lightly browned on the bottom)']
[' (StepDescription: remove-Briefly remove the pan from the heat to reduce spitting)']
[' (StepDescription: remove-Briefly remove from the heat again)']
[' (StepDescription: drizzle-drizzle 1 tablespoon soy sauce (watch for spitting) on the pan)']
[' (StepDescription: drizzle-drizzle with the 1 tablespoons sesame oil on the pan)']
[' (StepDescription: cook-cook pan for 2 minutes until the colour is darkened)']
